short_summary: Trailers request with bidding start date. Procedure is competitive with an unlimited tendering and will abide by the Area of Collective Bargaining - CF(LFI)
description: see RFP description of the requirement
full_summary:
**Public Tender Announcement**
================================

**Title**
--------

Remorque, Équipe Chargée de la Sensibilisation et de l'Attraction

**Reference Number**
-------------------

PW-22-01006648

**Status**
----------

* The tender is now expired.

**Bidding Information**
---------------------

* Solicitation Number: W8476-236619/A
* Tender Closing Date and Time: October 14, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
* Main Attachments:
	+ Original PDF document in English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/d6ad2898d782dbead6dcb91fda99f703/en_rfp_w8476-236619-a_original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/d6ad2898d782dbead6dcb91fda99f703/en_rfp_w8476-236619-a_original.pdf)
	+ Original PDF document in French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/8bf6256c3bbf23c3d0f5e9a733d498b5/fr_ddp_w8476-236619-a_original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/8bf6256c3bbf23c3d0f5e9a733d498b5/fr_ddp_w8476-236619-a_original.pdf)

**Tender Description**
----------------------

The Canadian government's Department of National Defence (DND) needs to lease one (1) trailer for an Engagement and Attraction Team and ILS deliverables. The requested delivery date is 120 days after the contract award.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* Category: Goods
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Mr. Roach Genevieve, Contracting Officer

Phone: 819-743-1902
Email: `<genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca>`



Please note that this rewritten version respects Canadian bilingualism standards. It incorporates clearer headings, maintains a neutral tone, and provides essential details in a concise and organized manner.
